page.title: 14LEISURE FACILITIES-BEDWORTH
page.content: The{MINERS WELFARE PARK & LEISURE {CENTRE}house most of the sports facilities,including squash courts & swimming pool.The council encourages use of the amenities by running a {"PASSPORT TO LEISURE" scheme}.Under 18's,senior citizens,registered disabled & unemployed people can gain free access to a wide range of facilities by purchasing a"passport" every 5 yrs,currently costing 75p.All the facilities are run by the Borough & largely funded by ratepayers.The amenities are well used by a wide variety of local people.{BEDWORTH {UNITED F.C.}which plays in the Southern League,has a floodlit ground at The Oval.{BEDWORTH C.C.}also has a ground here. It is used for Minor- County matches & 6-a-side tournaments. There are numerous amateur clubs in the area covering many sports.
